5. Compare the attendance values: Now that we have the attendance for all the November games, we can compare them with the attendance value from the November 26 game (18059).

6. Determine if the November 26 game has the highest attendance in November: By comparing each attendance value with the one from the November 26 game, we find that none of the other games had a higher attendance than the November 26 game (18059 < 20562).
